log: Mains leak at SW1A 1AA, reported 14:00. High pressure. Requires immediate shutoff. Specialist team required.
Routine check-up on G1 2QN. No issues found. System performing within standard parameters. Next service Oct 2026.
Slight rattle in the primary pump at the station near EH1 2NG. Doesn't look urgent but should be checked in the next month.
EMERGENCY: Pipe burst at the junction of High St and Station Rd (B1 1BB). Water flooding local shops. Urgency: 5.
Customer query regarding meter reading in Cardiff. No fault found. Postcode unknown, customer was on mobile.
Corrosion detected on external valve at LS1 4DY. Urgency is probably a 3. Schedule for repair within 14 days.
Standard inspection at site M4 1HQ. All seals intact. Pressure at 4.2 bar.
Severe structural damage to pump housing after vehicle collision. Location: L1 0AB. CRITICAL. Risk of system failure.
Low battery on telemetry unit at site near Brighton. Need to swap out the unit. Low priority.
Smell of gas reported near the school on Oxford St. NO POSTCODE PROVIDED. Immediate attendance requested.
Vandalism at substation. Graffiti only, but gate left open. Postcode: G42 9AY. Priority: 2.
Unusual noise reported from transformer at IV1 1AA. Site is remote. May need a drone inspection.
Scheduled maintenance for the entire block at CF10 1EP. Standard procedure. Category: Inspection.
Water quality report: slight turbidity in the line near BT7 1NN. Monitoring required over next 48h.
Total power failure at the industrial estate (NE1 1AD). Businesses affected. High priority backup needed.
Missing manhole cover on the pavement near the park. Location is NG1 5FW. Public safety hazard.
General enquiry: customer asking about smart meter roll-out in the PL4 area. Not a fault.
Vegetation overgrowth encroaching on power lines near S1 1WB. Needs trimming before winter storms.
Alarm triggered at pump station 4. Postcode: ZE1 0AA. False alarm caused by local wildlife.
URGENT: Sewage leak identified behind the shopping centre at YO1 7JF. Environment agency notified.
Planned upgrade of fibre optics at site CB2 1PZ. Work to commence at 08:00 tomorrow.
Minor leak in the customer-side pipe. Advice given. Address: 12 High St, OX1 4JD.
Potential gas leak. High priority. Location unknown - caller hung up but signal traced to Manchester area.
Faulty street light outside 45 Queen St, AB10 1XG. Reported by council. Priority: Low.
Smart meter installation scheduled for Monday at the property in EX1 1NT.
Critical failure of the cooling system at the data centre. Postcode: EC1A 1BB. Immediate response triggered.
Routine survey of the drainage network in the PO1 area. No issues detected.
Suspicious activity reported near the pylon at TA1 1AA. Security dispatched.
Frozen pipe reported at a commercial unit in DD1 1AA. No burst yet but high risk given the weather.
Multiple reports of low water pressure in the SE1 area. Investigating potential burst main.
